text: Zeale scalaris is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Francis Polkinghorne Pascoe in 1866. It is known from Colombia, Ecuador, Panama and Peru.BioLib.cz - Zeale scalaris. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1866
title: Zeale scalaris
